descriptionHtml:
The Power to control your games. Maintain a stable system, Increase game flow while relieving system stress. ATTK stands apart with a custom system resource allocation. Lock and boost system allows ATTK to be used with all PC games. Without being a part of the load. No matter how many times the games are reloaded ATTK will always be ready. Easy to boost all your PC games with one program. Focused on creating a better gaming environment, with added considerations for mods, for better gaming over all. In many ways ATTK works wonders, for top end to lower end computers. Custom temporary effect creates a greater merge between the GPU and CPU. As if combined the whole systems stress load is reduced, allowing graphics to fire freely.
Beta tested extensively. Provides a system safe effect. Windows XP and above is required.
author: ATTK
